query: how to remove unwanted people from a photo in photoshop
reference: To remove unwanted people from a photo in Photoshop, use the Remove Tool, Content-Aware Fill, or the Clone Stamp Tool. For the Remove Tool, brush over the unwanted person and Photoshop will attempt to remove them using AI. Content-Aware Fill, accessed via Edit, allows you to select the person and fill the area with surrounding pixels. The Clone Stamp Tool lets you manually sample and replace the area with other parts of the image.

query: why there are three engines not light up during starship launch
reference: During the launch of SpaceX's Starship, some of the engines were not lit up, or in use, because to redundancy and/or technical or safety considerations. The Starship is equipped with multiple engines, which are designed to to provide the necessary thrust to lift the spacecraft into orbit. However, not all engines are required to be operational during the launch sequence due to designed redundancy. In case of engine malfunction or failure, the Spaceship can then fallback on these engines. Another reason why some engines might not be operational might be due to engine anomalies.
